name: Devy's First Game [Name Pending]
description:
Hi there, everyone! This is my first game, so I hope you like it. Its not done yet, but if you just click on the play button, you could help me finish it! Let's work together, shall we? If the screen is too big you can click to make it full screen in the bottom corner.

I really want to thank Xillidonno (Emily Woods), Aswagger (Amanda Swiger), Giordorno Nin, Jake Gosche, and Ostrich2401 for their support!  I really hope we can work together again soon!
